snippet.title: Into Sandy's Cities - a Megawad in the Style of Sandy Petersen
snippet.description:
Welcome to "Into Sandy's Cities", a 32-level megawad, where each level is made exactly like Sandy Petersen made them for Doom 2.
▶Download link: https://www.doomworld.com/forum/topic/147181-into-sandys-cities-a-32-level-megawad-in-the-style-of-sandy-petersens-maps/

▶Sources:
Thumbnail background by Shallow https://twitter.com/ShallowBro
Text generated using eevee's Doom Text Generator https://c.eev.ee/doom-text-generator/

♫Music:
"Into Sandy's City" by Bobby Prince, uploaded to Archive.org by Manac03 https://archive.org/details/doom-2-ost 

Thanks for making Doom 2 so great, Sandy.
